skillTree.localised_description: A general's horse can be their most trusted and daring companion. Just don't name him 'Daisy'.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

skillTree.localised_description: The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.
The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Searing Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Searing Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Searing Doom Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Plague of Rust Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Glittering Robe"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Glittering Robe Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Glittering Robe Upgraded"

target_if: Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform
Not on or below a platform

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Gehenna's Golden Hounds"
Winds of Magic cost: -3 for "Gehenna's Golden Hounds Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -15% for "Gehenna's Golden Hounds Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Transmutation of Lead"

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Violence is always the answer, even when it's not.
There's nothing wrong with being aware of one's capabilities - particularly when one is capable of so much.
Deception is frowned upon, but only if you're found out.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +35%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: In a battle of wills, one must not falter.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Even Slaanesh would be unable to break this one's self control.
No being can kill what it cannot catch.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.

effects.description: adds the ability that grants the spell intensity
Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If knowledge is power, then this one is powerful indeed.
"The trick is to think two steps aheadâ€¦ and then think one step ahead of that."
This one could challenge an Ogre to an arm-wrestling match.
If there is anything left to learn about military planning, this one has yet to come across it.
Hardy and resilient, this being stands firm in the face of all challenges.
No arms have yet been forged that this warrior has been unable to master.
When the arrows are spent and the blades are all blunted, this perfect warrior can rely on their well-trained body to keep death from their door.
A place for everything and everything in its place. Live by this motto and Chaos will stand out like the proverbial sore thumb.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos, Chaos Dwarfs and Norsca
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Some may consider administration a tiresome process, but this servant of the Celestial Emperor knows that a tidy society makes for an efficient, effective one.

effects.description:
Construction cost: -10% for all buildings
	(local province)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: An inquisitive nature is only part of the skillset required for the Dragon's questioner, tasked with ensuring harmony prevails over Celestial lands.
